item.title: Creative Coding
item.description: Creative coding About My research imperatives run along the threads of trans-mediation, inter-semiotic translation, post-disciplinarity (interdisciplinarity, multidiscplinarity) and the general concerns of Human Computer Interaction (HCI). A large part of my contemporary practices in creating audiovisual materials is through creative coding. In coding there is the possibility to use plenty of expressions or functionalities. Coding and creative writing have many similarities in the way the writer-scripter organises the text with ideas; the mind can become creative; as it is, coding helps to increase imagination.
